snippet.title: Safety concern over Vic Police gun holster
snippet.content: Safety concerns have prompted Victoria Police to pause the introduction of 18,000 holsters for semiautomatic firearms. "We don't believe it impacts frontline policing at this point in time," Superintendent Tony Langdon told 3AW on Tuesday. The problem with the holsters was revealed last week in "a small number of incidences". (C) AAP 2017
